_sText: **AWP_GAME** BY UNREAL _**Short description** A large, mirrored AWP style map created to be ran either on normal servers or Deathmatch servers._ Map info: Supports 64 players, doesn't have much detail really, the idea was to keep it simple but still nice to play. The creation of this map was motivated by a guy who requested something like this: an AWP map with a middle structure (like awp india) and a few sniper towers arround. I ended up by adding an underground passage and an "fy iceworld" based layout on top, these changes will make the map more dynamic and less boring (hopefully). In terms of lightning and visuals I made an effort to keep the map nor too bright nor dark. I also added cubemaps to perfect it a bit, and have the scopes reflecting world. I hope you like it, Have fun.
